## Collections.ConvertingCollector.\_buildItem() method

Helper method for derived classes to build an item from a key and a source representation using a default or supplied factory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected _buildItem(key: CollectibleKey<TITEM>, itemOrCb: TSRC | CollectibleFactoryCallback<TITEM>): Result<TITEM>;
```

key


</td><td>

[CollectibleKey](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblekey.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM&gt;


</td><td>

The key of the item to build.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

itemOrCb


</td><td>

TSRC \| [CollectibleFactoryCallback](./ts-utils.collections.collectiblefactorycallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM&gt;


</td><td>

The source representation of the item to build, or a factory callback to create it.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;TITEM&gt;

Returns [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) with the item if it is built, or [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with an error if the item cannot be built.
